stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Dr. Jerome is absolutely hilarious and passionate about COMM. I took the Honors section of this class although I am not a COMM major, and although I was confused at first, she pretty much holds your hand through the whole class. Very hard to do poorly as long as you listen to feedback and ask questions. She will often give you answers to tests.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: She is highly considerate and really lets you decide how much you want to get out of her class. Attendance is completely optional and lectures are not necessary but she will randomly give points for showing up sometimes.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: One of the best professors, but also one of the most time-consuming courses. There is one major assignment broken into three parts throughout the semester with a final presentation. Listen to ALL of her feedback or you will fail. Follow the rubric to a tee. She accepts no excuses and no late work. Tests had study guides but required MUCH studying.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Dr. Jerome is a good professor, but she won\'t accept late work, so don\'t cut it close when turning in assignments. If you need to talk to her about something, she checks her e-mail pretty frequently, and regarding extra credit, you can get up to 15 points worth of it.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: She a very laid back professor and her class was actually fun and interesting. She is very personable and friendly. Shes very easy to reach outside of class and responds to emails within a few hours . I would highly recommend her.

stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER  HILARIOUS
comments: Dr. Jerome is hilarious! Her tests are HARD, too. When she says "Understand" something on a study guide, you need to study and READ everything about the particular thing she\'s talking about. She\'s not hard, but her standards are high though. She gives some extra credit. DONT skip class because her powerpoints dont explain everything on the test!!!

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  INSPIRATIONAL
comments: I had Dr. Jerome for COMM Foundations. She makes complex ideas make sense. If you don\'t come to class, you won\'t pass. One of the most knowledgeable professors I\'ve had. She\'s there for her students, but she does have expectations. The WKU COMM department is one of, if not, the best in the state.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Participation matters (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I LOVED this class and Dr. Jerome! She takes a little warming up to but very good teacher. Tests were not hard as long as you study straight from her study guides. Several writing assignments but clear grading criteria, and they weren\'t too hard.

stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  TOUGH GRADER  RESPECTED
comments: Dr. Jerome is a good professor. This is my second class I\'ve had with her. There are five speeches, so you\'re usually starting your next outline when you finish a speech. A little meticulous with the grading, but the rubrics are clear cut. She\'s funny and pretty laid back. I would recommend taking her if you have the chance.

comments: Dr. Jerome is a great teacher, shes funny and helpful. It takes a while for her to warm up to the class. She will help you as much as possible. Comm 200 is not an easy class and there is alot of writing and long papers that count for alot but its a decent class.

comments: Dr. Jerome is such a great teacher! She is so fun and personable, I have many conversations with her outside of class. The assignments are easy but you do have to read. Most of it she goes over in class however. She takes each test herself to make sure the wording is right too. I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND HER!

comments: Great professor! Very helpful and knowledgeable. Cured my fear of public speaking!

comments: Amazing! She\'s really personable. Biased, so get on her good side. Tests are pretty hard but easy if you study and READ. READ. READ. READ. Extremely smart, knows what she is talking about, almost intimidating with her knowledge. Super sweet!

comments: Dr. Jerome was a fun a teacher. I graduated a while back now, but will always remember her class. Make sure you actually go to her class, or chances are that you will be lost. Don\'t turn in anything late, or your grade will suffer. Hope this helps!
